title: Book Team Hotel for Away Game
description: A travel manager needs to book a block of hotel rooms for the team for an upcoming away game.

tasks.description: Identify the number of rooms needed and the check-in/check-out dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the specific lodging requirements.

tasks.description: Search for hotels near the opponent's stadium that have the required availability and meet the team's standards.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds two suitable hotels with availability.

tasks.description: Negotiate a group rate and book the block of rooms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the rooms at a discounted rate.
